SELECT DAT.ORDER_KEY AS ORDER_KEY , DAT.AC_NM AS AC_NM , DAT.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , DAT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM , DAT.ORDER_AC_NM AS ORDER_AC_NM , DAT.ORDER_DT AS ORDER_DT , DAT.ORDER_AMOUNT AS ORDER_AMOUNT , DAT.ORDER_COUNT AS ORDER_COUNT , DAT.ORDER_EMP_NM AS ORDER_EMP_NM , DAT.SALES_EMP_NM AS SALES_EMP_NM , DAT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY AS ORDER_CT_FK_KEY , DAT.ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AS ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY , DAT.ORDER_PAY_TERMS AS ORDER_PAY_TERMS , DAT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , DAT.REG_TM AS REG_TM , DAT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , DAT.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , DAT.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , DAT.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY , DAT.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY FROM ( SELECT POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY AS ORDER_KEY /* 발주번호 */ , CAT1.AC_NM AS AC_NM /* 고객사 명 */ , PMT.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PMT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM /* 프로젝트명 */ , CAT2.AC_NM AS ORDER_AC_NM /* 매입처명 */ , POT.ORDER_DT AS ORDER_DT /* 발주일 */ , POT.ORDER_AMOUNT AS ORDER_AMOUNT /* 발주금액합계 */ , (SELECT SUM(POP.ORDER_QUANTITY) FROM PJ_ORDER_PRODUCT_TB POP WHERE POP.PJ_ORDER_KEY = POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY) AS ORDER_COUNT /* 발주수량 */ , CET1.EMP_NM AS ORDER_EMP_NM /* 발주자명 */ , CET2.EMP_NM AS SALES_EMP_NM /* 담당영업명 */ , POT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY AS ORDER_CT_FK_KEY , POT.ORDER_AC_KEY AS ORDER_AC_KEY , POT.ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AS ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY , POT.ORDER_PAY_TERMS AS ORDER_PAY_TERMS , POT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , POT.REG_TM AS REG_TM , POT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , POT.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , POT.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , POT.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY , PMT.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY FROM PJ_ORDER_TB POT JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PMT ON POT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY /* 프로젝트 정보 */ JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT1 ON PMT.AC_KEY = CAT1.AC_KEY /* 고객사 정보 */ JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT2 ON POT.ORDER_AC_KEY = CAT2.AC_KEY /* 발주처 정보 */ JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET1 ON POT.REG_EMP_KEY = CET1.EMP_KEY /* 발주자 정보 */ JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET2 ON PMT.PJ_SALE_EMP_KEY = CET2.EMP_KEY /* 담당영업정보 */ WHERE POT.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{orderKeySearch}, '%')) /* 발주번호 조건검색 */
AND PMT.PJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{pjNm}, '%')) /* 프로젝트명 조건검색 */
AND POT.ORDER_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{orderDtFrom}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{orderDtTo}, '-', '') /* 기간 조건 검색 */
AND CET1.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{orderEmpNm}, '%')) /* 발주자 조건검색 */
) DAT ORDER BY DAT.REG_DT DESC, DAT.REG_TM DESC

SELECT POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY AS ORDER_KEY /* 발주번호 */ , CAT1.AC_NM AS AC_NM /* 고객사 명 */ , PMT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM /* 프로젝트명 */ , CAT2.AC_NM AS ORDER_AC_NM /* 매입처명 */ , POT.ORDER_DT AS ORDER_DT /* 발주일 */ , POT.ORDER_AMOUNT AS ORDER_AMOUNT /* 발주금액합계 */ , CET1.EMP_NM AS ORDER_EMP_NM /* 발주자명 */ , CET2.EMP_NM AS SALES_EMP_NM /* 담당영업명 */ , POT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY AS ORDER_CT_FK_KEY , POT.ORDER_AC_KEY AS ORDER_AC_KEY , POT.ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AS ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY , POT.ORDER_PAY_TERMS AS ORDER_PAY_TERMS , POT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , POT.REG_TM AS REG_TM , POT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , POT.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , POT.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , POT.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY , PMT.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY FROM PJ_ORDER_TB POT JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PMT ON POT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY /* 프로젝트 정보 */ JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT1 ON PMT.AC_KEY = CAT1.AC_KEY /* 고객사 정보 */ JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT2 ON POT.ORDER_AC_KEY = CAT2.AC_KEY /* 발주처 정보 */ JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET1 ON POT.REG_EMP_KEY = CET1.EMP_KEY /* 발주자 정보 */ JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET2 ON PMT.PJ_SALE_EMP_KEY = CET2.EMP_KEY /* 담당영업정보 */ WHERE POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey} /* 발주번호 조건검색 */

SELECT POM.PJ_ORDER_KEY AS ORDER_KEY , POM.ORDER_SEQ AS ORDER_SEQ , POM.ORDER_PM_FK_KEY AS ORDER_PM_FK_KEY /* 제품키*/ , PPM.PM_NM_CD AS PM_NM /* 제품명*/ , POM.ORDER_QUANTITY AS ORDER_QUANTITY /* 수량*/ , POM.ORDER_UPRICE AS ORDER_UPRICE /* 단가*/ , POM.ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT /* 합계*/ , POM.MT_RATE AS MT_RATE , POM.ORDER_KIND AS ORDER_CATEGORY /* 매입구분*/ , POM.REMARK AS REMARK /* 제품상세*/ , POM.FREE_MT_START_DT AS FREE_MT_START_DT , POM.FREE_MT_END_DT AS FREE_MT_END_DT , POM.ORDER_RECEIPT_DT AS ORDER_RECEIPT_DT /*발주일자*/ , POM.REG_DT AS REG_DT , POM.REG_TM AS REG_TM , POM.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , POM.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , POM.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , POM.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_ORDER_PRODUCT_TB POM JOIN PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PPM ON POM.ORDER_PM_FK_KEY = PPM.PM_KEY WHERE PJ_ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey}
